TextView.android:text: \u2022 Roles of CSE in solving complicated tasks
\u2022 Other Innovative topics are also welcome.
\u2022 Maximum of 2 members in a team
\u2022 The ppt should not exceed 30 slides
Maximum time for completion of presentation is 8 minutes
Participants are requested to mail their abstracts to
Plagiarism, in any way, is strictly prohibited.
Kindly bring both ur hardcopy and softcopy to the event
Last date for submission of ur abstracts:05/03/ 2020.
It consists of simple MCQs on cryptography and participants have to complete them under 30 minutes
Tests what you know about cryptography
Have to obtain the PLAIN TEXT using clues (keys) given .
It tests how you relate your knowledge on cryptography to real world
Final round is completely technical oriented.
It tests how you apply your knowledge on cryptography to Technical world
The events consists of two rounds
This is an offline test contains questions on basics of DBMS
In this round,participants compete with each other on online to solve the given problem statement regarding Database Management
Based on consideration of efficient problem solving and Time taken ,winners would be awarded
\u2022 Maximum of 1 members in a team
Maximum time for completion of round1 and round 2 are 30 min and 1hr respectively
This is a written preliminary round and teams selected will get to participate in the final round.
Final round will be oral with audiovisual questions as well.
For technical as well as nontechnical
There should be a maximum of 3 participants from a team.
The specific rules regarding evaluation procedure, time to reply a particular answer and the type of the round will be given before the actual start of the competition.
BrainDrain Crew consists of 3 rounds.Every participant will surely have fun and the winners will be awarded with certificates.
MCQs with four options single correct type.
Error detection in the code. Find the bugs and correct the code.
Online coding Final level , it's only getting tougher. Time complexity to be the main consideration.
WRITTEN TEST consisting of MCQ's based on \n•Technical •Non-Technical\n•Psychological •General Aptitude
GROUP DISCUSSION where On-Screen video description should be discussed within a group of candidates qualified from the 1st round.
Shortlisted participants will qualify for the final round PERSONAL INTERVIEW.The decision of HR will be final and binding.
Participants should be on time for respective rounds.
No electronic devices ( Calculators , Mobile phones etc., ) are allowed during the test.
No cheating,number must be striked off immediately after the Number is picked
We need appropriate answers. Answers will be cross verified after their claim.
Dazzle Coding is an Individual Event.The compiler provided will be Turbo C.This event consists of two rounds.
The events consists of two rounds
C program statement of medium complexity will be given.
C program statement of high complexity will be given.
Each participant has to write the code for the problem statement,with MONITOR OFF.
Participants whose code gets executed will be given higher preference
The second preference will be given to code with least number of errors.
In case of tie in number of errors then timing will be considered.
Shortlisted participants of Round I will appear for Round II for which above rules will be applicable.

Algobuilder is a online contest where a large number of students from various colleges clash to prove their mettle. If you are good at building algorithms then take part in the contest to win exciting prizes.
Each participant will be given three problems and 1:30 hr time will be given to solve them. Score will be alloted based on hacker rank points scheme.
Participants have to register for the contest before the contest stars in hackerrank/codechef using this link https://www.hackerrank.com/algo-builder/
Build the best to be the best!
Are you the one who indulges in the amazing visual experience of the websites? Then this event is for you.
The events consists of three rounds
Contestants will be given 30 MCQ's which they are expected to solve in 30mins.
A picture of a webpage will be given for which they are expected to create it.
A final round where a simple webpage performing specific features based on an on-spot topic(any language can be used for implementation), in time of 3 hrs.
Getting Placement in an MNC is easy today. Surviving as an Engineer in an MNC is becoming a Big Task. So participate in Mr.Engineer to test your skills in a Working Environment.
The events consists of three rounds
Every Team will be Provided with Question Paper and Answer Sheets. Within 30 Mins Your Team has to answer the Questions. The Questions are purely Technical.
In Round 2(30 min) Every Team will be Tested on Their Communication Skills and the extent to which a person in a team can communicate with the rest. Ex: JAM , Group Discussion.

This is the Third Round and Final Round , Here The Teams will be tested on their Coordination Skills and Technical Skills. A Fun Game Will be conducted among the Teams which is easy to play and difficult to master.
Team can have a maximum of 4 Members
In Every Round The Top 50% of The Teams will be entering to the Next Round.
The Specific Rules regarding Evaluation procedure are provided before the actual start of the Competition.
Participants has to get their own laptops with preinstalled compilers for the programming languages they use(C,C++,etc) and also including compatibility for the following
The events consists of one rounds
Codes will be checked and questions will be asked orally about what the participants had done(during coding phase).
Top 2 participants would be provided with prizes and certificates based on the efficiency of codes and the communication skills, answers given in Q and A session.
